overview: This is the story of the Devil as told through his dark manifestations in art, music and popular culture throughout history. Where does the familiar image of the Devil come from? What does it mean? And why are we both attracted and repulsed by it? From the Bible to Rock and Roll to the World Wide Web, the Devil We Know sheds new light on the Prince of Darkness through his manifestations in the arts and popular culture.
title: The Devil We Know
